name: Pitch Deck - Ask
description: Tell the investor how much money you need, and what it gets you. If you can lay out where you’ll be inside of a year, which should make you Series A ready, that’s powerful.

bullet_points.description: Examples. 1.5 million. This is for engineers and marketting. With this money we'll hit all the milestones for our next round within 2 days. Thanks.
